_sText:
Seven story building. 
Currently there is one bomb site on which is located on the roof.
There are a couple ways to get to the roof for both teams.
All ladders work (even on the dumpster and the portable one) and all doors work. 


Notes:
-  This is obviously my first map. Not just my first CS:S map, but my first map ever.
-  Bots don't do very well inside the building, I haven't worked on their paths at all.
-  This beta is mostly for layout and I welcome all useful comments and suggestions.


Things I am planning on changing:
-  The C4 explosion kills you just about everywhere
-  Lighting and details (different textures, objects, etc...)
-  Change bounding box into a more realistic environment
-  Change most wooden crates into other objects (cars, trees, etc...)
-  Make a small building out of the two-walled sector near T spawn
-  Detail the insides of the rooms
-  Possibly spread out the spawns so they are farther from the objective building
-  Maybe a basement with a bombsite and a couple different entrances
